game.title: Escape from Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time has no meaning, the fabric of reality is unraveling. The last remnants of humanity are trapped in an eternal loop, reliving the same day over and over. You play as Aria, a young woman with the ability to manipulate time itself. Armed with your newfound powers, you must navigate through a world that's slowly disappearing, uncovering secrets about the mysterious force behind the loops and trying to find a way to escape the never-ending cycle.
game.beginning: Aria wakes up on the same day as the rest of humanity - June 10th. She finds herself in her apartment, but everything is different from what she remembers. The world outside is quiet, the buildings are empty, and there's no sign of life anywhere. But Aria notices something strange - a clock ticking away on her wall, counting down to... something.
game.ending: Aria finally discovers that the loops are not just random events, but part of a larger experiment designed by an advanced civilization to test humanity's ability to adapt and evolve. She also finds out that she is one of the chosen few who have been gifted with the power to manipulate time. Armed with this knowledge, Aria sets out on a perilous journey through different eras of human history, gathering allies and resources while trying to prevent the impending apocalypse that threatens to wipe out humanity for good.
